typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Employees as (emailAddress as string, employeeCode as string, firstName as string, jobTitleName as string, lastName as string, phoneNumber as string, preferredFullName as string, region as string, userId as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> EmployeeJson
EmployeeJson foldDown(unroll(),
	mapColumn(
		Employees
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
